00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 
00003 import roslib
00004 import sys
00005 import rospy
00006 from geometry_msgs.msg import Vector3, Vector3Stamped
00007 import numpy as np
00008 from uav_utils import ThermalRise
00009 from mathutils import saturation, quat2Reb, Vector2Array
00010 from math import floor, exp
00011 from last_letter.msg import SimStates, SimSensor3, Environment
00012 
00013 #######################  Accelerometer Class  #####################################################
00014 
00015 class Accelerometer():
00016         def __init__(self,name):
00017                 
00018                 rospy.loginfo('Create ' + name +' Sensor')
00019                 
00020                 self.dt = 1.0/rospy.get_param(name+'/rate', 100.0)
00021                 self.rate =  rospy.Rate(rospy.get_param(name+'/rate', 100.0))
00022                 rospy.loginfo("\ta.rate: %.1f Hz",1.0/self.dt)
00023 
00024                 self.cp =  np.array(rospy.get_param(name+'/CP', [0.0, 0.0, 0.0])).reshape(3,1)
00025                 rospy.loginfo("\tb.position: [%.2f,%.2f,%.2f]", self.cp[0],self.cp[1],self.cp[2])
00026 
00027                 self.resolution = rospy.get_param(name+'/resolution', 0.0001)
00028                 rospy.loginfo("\tc.resolution: %.1e g",self.resolution)
00029 
00030                 self.maxvalue = rospy.get_param(name+'/max', 16.0)
00031                 rospy.loginfo("\td.maxvalue: %.2f g",self.maxvalue)
00032 
00033                 self.std_coeff = rospy.get_param(name+'/std_coeff', [0.0,0.0,0.0])
00034                 rospy.loginfo("\te.noise coeff:")
00035                 rospy.loginfo("\t\t1.main std: %.3f",self.std_coeff[0])
00036                 rospy.loginfo("\t\t2.bias coeff: %.3f",self.std_coeff[1])
00037                 rospy.loginfo("\t\t3.random walk coeff: %.3f",self.std_coeff[2])
00038                 
00039                 #Noise Characteristics
00040                 self.bs = np.random.normal(0,rospy.get_param(name+'/scaleBias', 0.03)/3,3)
00041                 self.ks = np.random.normal(0,rospy.get_param(name+'/scaleThermal', 0.002)/3,3)
00042                 self.bb = np.random.normal(0,rospy.get_param(name+'/offsetBias', 0.785)/3,3)
00043                 self.kb = np.random.normal(0,rospy.get_param(name+'/offsetThermal', 0.0084)/3,3)
00044                 self.p0 = rospy.get_param(name+'/RWPSD', 0.00392)       
00045                 self.bias=Vector3()
00046                 self.randomwalk=Vector3()
00047                 self.scale = Vector3()
00048                 
00049                 self.temp=25.0
00050                 self.grav=9.807
00051                 
00052                 #Thermal Chracteristics
00053                 self.thermalMass = ThermalRise(name)
00054                 rospy.loginfo("\tf.Loading Thermal Chracteristics")
00055                 self.airspeed = 0.0
00056                 
00057                 self.measurement = SimSensor3()
00058 
00059                 self.pub = rospy.Publisher(name, SimSensor3)
00060                 self.states_sub = rospy.Subscriber("states",SimStates,self.StatesCallback)
00061                 self.env_sub = rospy.Subscriber("environment",Environment,self.EnvironmentCallback)
00062 
00063                 self.real=SimStates()
00064                 self.realnew=False
00065 
00066         def iterate(self,states):
00067                 Reb = quat2Reb(states.pose.orientation)
00068                 
00069                 rw_noise = np.random.normal(0,self.p0,3)
00070                 self.randomwalk.x +=self.dt*rw_noise[0]
00071                 self.randomwalk.y +=self.dt*rw_noise[1]
00072                 self.randomwalk.z +=self.dt*rw_noise[2]
00073                 
00074                 self.bias.x = self.bb[0] + self.kb[0] * (self.temp - 298.15)
00075                 self.bias.y = self.bb[1] + self.kb[1] * (self.temp - 298.15)
00076                 self.bias.z = self.bb[1] + self.kb[1] * (self.temp - 298.15)
00077                 
00078                 self.scale.x = self.bs[0] + self.ks[0] * (self.temp - 298.15)
00079                 self.scale.y = self.bs[1] + self.ks[1] * (self.temp - 298.15)
00080                 self.scale.z = self.bs[2] + self.ks[2] * (self.temp - 298.15)
00081 
00082                 avel = Vector2Array(states.velocity.angular)
00083                 aveldot = Vector2Array(states.acceleration.angular)
00084                 missal = np.cross(avel,np.cross(avel,self.cp.T)) + np.cross(aveldot,self.cp.T)
00085                 
00086                 self.measurement.axis.x = (1+self.scale.x)*(states.acceleration.linear.x/self.grav + missal[0][0] + self.grav*Reb[2][0]) + self.bias.x + self.randomwalk.x
00087                 self.measurement.axis.y = (1+self.scale.y)*(states.acceleration.linear.y/self.grav + missal[0][1] + self.grav*Reb[2][1]) + self.bias.y + self.randomwalk.y
00088                 self.measurement.axis.z = (1+self.scale.z)*(states.acceleration.linear.z/self.grav + missal[0][2] + self.grav*Reb[2][2]) + self.bias.z + self.randomwalk.z
00089 
00090                 self.measurement.axis.x = saturation(floor(self.measurement.axis.x/self.resolution)*self.resolution,-self.maxvalue*self.grav, self.maxvalue*self.grav)
00091                 self.measurement.axis.y = saturation(floor(self.measurement.axis.y/self.resolution)*self.resolution,-self.maxvalue*self.grav, self.maxvalue*self.grav)
00092                 self.measurement.axis.z = saturation(floor(self.measurement.axis.z/self.resolution)*self.resolution,-self.maxvalue*self.grav, self.maxvalue*self.grav)
00093 
00094                 self.tempOffset = self.thermalMass.step(self.airspeed,self.dt)
00095                 self.measurement.temperature = self.temp + self.tempOffset
00096 
00097 
00098         def StatesCallback(self,data):
00099                 self.real=data
00100                 self.realnew=True
00101 
00102         def EnvironmentCallback(self,data):
00103                 self.grav=data.gravity
00104                 self.temp=data.temperature
00105                 if self.realnew:
00106                         self.airspeed = np.sqrt(pow(self.real.velocity.linear.x - data.wind.x,2) + pow(self.real.velocity.linear.y - data.wind.y,2) + pow(self.real.velocity.linear.z - data.wind.z,2))
00107                         
00108 
00109 ###################################################################################################     
00110 #######################  Main Program  ############################################################
00111 ###################################################################################################     
00112 if __name__ == '__main__':
00113         rospy.init_node('acc_model')
00114 
00115         fullname = rospy.get_name().split('/')
00116         accel = Accelerometer(fullname[-1])
00117 
00118         while not rospy.is_shutdown():
00119                 if accel.realnew:
00120                         accel.realnew=False
00121                         accel.iterate(accel.real)
00122                         accel.measurement.header.stamp=rospy.Time.now()
00123                 accel.pub.publish(accel.measurement)
00124                 accel.rate.sleep()
